DDL.statement: CREATE OR REPLACE VIEW `view_sync3b` AS SELECT `app_label_data`.`UNIQUE_ID` AS `UNIQUE_ID`, `app_label_data`.`LINE` AS `LINE`, `view_sync3a`.`LABEL_TYPE` AS `LABEL_TYPE`, `app_label_data`.`USER_ID` AS `USER_ID`, `app_label_data`.`WORKSTATION_ID` AS `WORKSTATION_ID`, `view_sync3a`.`PROCESS_ORDER` AS `PROCESS_ORDER`, `app_label_data`.`REQUIRED_RESOURCE` AS `REQUIRED_RESOURCE`, `view_sync3a`.`MATERIAL` AS `MATERIAL`, `app_label_data`.`MATERIAL_TYPE` AS `MATERIAL_TYPE`, `app_process_order`.`DESCRIPTION` AS `DESCRIPTION`, `view_sync3a`.`BATCH_NUMBER` AS `BATCH_NUMBER`, `app_label_data`.`BATCH_PREFIX` AS `BATCH_PREFIX`, `app_label_data`.`BATCH_SUFFIX` AS `BATCH_SUFFIX`, `app_process_order`.`STATUS` AS `STATUS`, `app_process_order`.`REQUIRED_UOM` AS `REQUIRED_UOM`, `app_label_data`.`PRINT_DATE` AS `PRINT_DATE`, `app_label_data`.`PROD_EAN` AS `PROD_EAN`, `app_label_data`.`PROD_VARIANT` AS `PROD_VARIANT`, `app_label_data`.`PROD_QUANTITY` AS `PROD_QUANTITY`, `app_label_data`.`PROD_UOM` AS `PROD_UOM`, `app_label_data`.`BASE_EAN` AS `BASE_EAN`, `app_label_data`.`BASE_VARIANT` AS `BASE_VARIANT`, `app_label_data`.`BASE_QUANTITY` AS `BASE_QUANTITY`, `app_label_data`.`BASE_UOM` AS `BASE_UOM`, `app_label_data`.`DATE_OF_MANUFACTURE` AS `DATE_OF_MANUFACTURE`, `app_label_data`.`EXPIRY_DATE` AS `EXPIRY_DATE`, `app_material`.`UPDATED` AS `MATERIAL_UPDATED`, `app_process_order`.`UPDATED` AS `PROCESS_ORDER_UPDATED`, `app_process_order`.`CUSTOMER_ID` AS `CUSTOMER_ID`, `app_customer`.`CUSTOMER_NAME` AS `CUSTOMER_NAME`, `app_label_data`.`OVERRIDE_MANUFACTURE_DATE` AS `OVERRIDE_MANUFACTURE_DATE`, `app_label_data`.`OVERRIDE_EXPIRY_DATE` AS `OVERRIDE_EXPIRY_DATE`, `app_label_data`.`OVERRIDE_BATCH_PREFIX` AS `OVERRIDE_BATCH_PREFIX`, `app_material`.`OVERRIDE_PACK_LABEL` AS `OVERRIDE_PACK_LABEL`, `app_material`.`PACK_LABEL_MODULE_ID` AS `PACK_LABEL_MODULE_ID`, `app_material`.`OVERRIDE_PALLET_LABEL` AS `OVERRIDE_PALLET_LABEL`, `app_material`.`PALLET_LABEL_MODULE_ID` AS `PALLET_LABEL_MODULE_ID`, `app_label_data`.`LAYERS` AS `LAYERS` FROM ( ( ( ( `app_process_order` JOIN `view_sync3a` ON ( ( `app_process_order`.`PROCESS_ORDER` = `view_sync3a`.`PROCESS_ORDER` ) ) ) JOIN `app_label_data` ON ( ( ( `app_label_data`.`PRINT_DATE` = `view_sync3a`.`PRINT_DATE` ) AND ( `app_label_data`.`MATERIAL` = `view_sync3a`.`MATERIAL` ) AND ( `app_label_data`.`BATCH_NUMBER` = `view_sync3a`.`BATCH_NUMBER` ) AND ( `app_label_data`.`PROCESS_ORDER` = `view_sync3a`.`PROCESS_ORDER` ) AND ( `app_label_data`.`LABEL_TYPE` = `view_sync3a`.`LABEL_TYPE` ) AND ( `app_label_data`.`LINE` = `view_sync3a`.`LINE` ) ) ) ) JOIN `app_material` ON ( ( `app_material`.`MATERIAL` = `app_label_data`.`MATERIAL` ) ) ) JOIN `app_customer` ON ( ( `app_customer`.`CUSTOMER_ID` = `app_process_order`.`CUSTOMER_ID` ) ) ) WHERE ( ( `app_process_order`.`STATUS` = 'Ready' ) AND ( `app_label_data`.`LINE` > '' ) )
